text: Timila'i ke bha'eko cha ki allahako batoma kharca gardainau? Jaba ki akasaharu ra jaminako svamitva allahakai nimti cha, timiharumadhye juna vyaktile (makkako) vijayabhanda pahila kharca garyo ra lada'i garyo uniharu aruko samana huna sakdainan. Uniharuko darja ti manisaharubhanda badhi cha, jasale pachi kharca gare ra dharma yud'dha gare. Ho allahale sabaila'i bhala'iko vacana ta di'eko cha ra juna kama timile gardachau allaha tyasala'i jandacha
